x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | ig1pval.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |

| 3 |  | ig1pcl.u | |- U = ( LIdeal ` P ) |
| 4 |  | ig1prsp.k | |- K = ( RSpan ` P ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_ig1pcl | |- ( ( R e. DivRing /\ I e. U ) -> ( G ` I ) e. I ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ||r ` P ) = ( ||r ` P ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 6 | #P_ig1pdvds | |- ( ( R e. DivRing /\ I e. U /\ x e. I ) -> ( G ` I ) ( ||r ` P ) x ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_3expa | |- ( ( ( R e. DivRing /\ I e. U ) /\ x e. I ) -> ( G ` I ) ( ||r ` P ) x ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ( R e. DivRing /\ I e. U ) -> A. x e. I ( G ` I ) ( ||r ` P ) x ) |
| 10 |  | #P_drngring | |- ( R e. DivRing -> R e. Ring ) |
| 11 | 1 | #P_ply1ring | |- ( R e. Ring -> P e. Ring ) |

| 14 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( R e. DivRing /\ I e. U ) -> I e. U ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` P ) = ( Base ` P ) |
| 16 | 15, 3 | #P_lidlss | |- ( I e. U -> I C_ ( Base ` P ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( R e. DivRing /\ I e. U ) -> I C_ ( Base ` P ) ) |
| 18 | 17, 5 | #P_sseldd | |- ( ( R e. DivRing /\ I e. U ) -> ( G ` I ) e. ( Base ` P ) ) |
| 19 | 15, 3, 4, 6 | #P_lidldvgen | |- ( ( P e. Ring /\ I e. U /\ ( G ` I ) e. ( Base ` P ) ) -> ( I = ( K ` { ( G ` I ) } ) <-> ( ( G ` I ) e. I /\ A. x e. I ( G ` I ) ( ||r ` P ) x ) ) ) |
| 20 | 13, 14, 18, 19 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( R e. DivRing /\ I e. U ) -> ( I = ( K ` { ( G ` I ) } ) <-> ( ( G ` I ) e. I /\ A. x e. I ( G ` I ) ( ||r ` P ) x ) ) ) |
| 21 | 5, 9, 20 | #P_mpbir2and | |- ( ( R e. DivRing /\ I e. U ) -> I = ( K ` { ( G ` I ) } ) ) |
